Package controllers

Class GameController

  • java.lang.Object
    • play.mvc.Results
      • play.mvc.Controller
        • controllers.GameController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    play.mvc.Http.HeaderNames, play.mvc.Http.Status
    public class GameController
extends play.mvc.Controller
    This controller contains actions to handle HTTP requests for the game mechanics.

    • Method Detail

      • defaultGame

        public play.mvc.Result defaultGame​(play.mvc.Http.Request request)
        An action that renders the defaultGame HTML page with the money displayed in the navbar and the ingredients from the database. Called when the /games/defaultGame route receives a GET request.
        Parameters:
        request - Request the session storage.
        Returns:
        OK if there is a user in the session. Else redirect to the login page.

      • requestMoney

        public play.mvc.Result requestMoney​(play.mvc.Http.Request request)
        Function that updates the money and the reward from the user after a game is played. Called when the /games/getMoney route receive a POST request.
        Parameters:
        request - The money which is fetched to the server as JSON.
        Returns:
        Redirect to the defaultGame url, adding the money to the session.

      • gameLevelTwo

        public play.mvc.Result gameLevelTwo​(play.mvc.Http.Request request)
        An action that renders the game level two HTML page with the money displayed in the navbar. Called when the /games/gameLevelTwo route receive a GET request.
        Parameters:
        request - Request the session storage.
        Returns:
        OK if there is a user in the session, else redirect to the login page.

      • gameLevelTwoMemory

        public play.mvc.Result gameLevelTwoMemory​(play.mvc.Http.Request request)
        An action that renders the memory HTML page for level two with the money displayed in the navbar. Called when the /games/gameLevelTwoMemory route receive a GET request.
        Parameters:
        request - Request the session storage.
        Returns:
        OK if there is a user in the session, else redirect to the login page.

        public play.mvc.Result gameLevelThree​(play.mvc.Http.Request request)
        An action that renders the first game of level three HTML page with the money displayed in the navbar. Called when the /games/gameLevelThreeGame1 route receive a GET request.
        Parameters:
        request - Request the session storage.
        Returns:
        OK if there is a user in the session, else redirect to the login page.

        Returns:

        OK
